cleaned_text: What Is Homeopathy? Homeopathy is an alternative medicine approach that uses natural remedies to help the body heal itself. This approach is based on the idea of treating 'like with like' and that the body can cure itself. Homeopathic approach then assumes that a substance that causes symptoms in a healthy individual could be diluted and used to treat someone with a condition that has the same symptoms. For example, red onions often make your nose run and your eyes water. A homeopath may then use red onions to help individuals with hay fever, colds, or chronic respiratory inflammation since the body's reaction to red onions shows it's impacting the respiratory tract. How Homeopathy Can Help Your Health Homeopathy uses natural remedies such as ingredients from plants, animal products, or minerals to help treat illnesses. Homeopathic therapies can help you maintain your general health, address acute illnesses, and some chronic illnesses. However, don't use homeopathy for life-threatening conditions or to replace vaccines. Homeopathic medicine can help with various health issues, including: - Allergies - Depression - Chronic pain - Sciatic pain - Migraines - Common cold - Fatigue - Irritable bowel syndrome - Toothaches - Premenstrual syndrome Personalized Homeopathic Approach to Heal Your Whole Body Dr. Gregory Pitman is an experienced homeopath who has been serving families in the greater Cincinnati area for over 35 years. Additionally, Dr. Pitman is a Diplomat of the National Board of Homeopathic Examiners. To determine if a homeopathic approach is right for you, Dr. Pitman starts with a comprehensive consultation. He will review your health needs, physical, emotional, and mental well-being before recommending a treatment plan individualized to your needs.
